Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Shelf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Shelf extends Object implements Serializable
Model's internal shelf representation
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    protected static class 
    Shelf.ShelfDeserializer
    Protected class that contains the gson custom deserializer logic for Shelf.
    The valid Json element tree representing the object has the following structure:
    Each tile is represented as its string representation (see Tile.toString()) Tile
    Each column is represented as a json Array in objects each named column_i, where i is the index of the column.
    The json is expected to have the structure {shelf : {
    column_0 : [...],
    column_1 : [...],
    ...
    }
    }
    The names of the attributes are irrelevant
    protected static class 
    Shelf.ShelfSerializer
    Protected class that contains the gson custom serializer logic for Shelf.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shelf

  • Method Details

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile(int row, int col)
      Get tile at given x, y coordinates.
      Parameters:
      row - Row of the desired tile
      col - Column of the desired tile
      Returns:
      Tile in the position [row, col], NOTILE if out of bounds or empty

    • getAllShelf

      public Tile[][] getAllShelf()
      Get a matrix representation of the shelf
      Returns:
      The shelf as a matrix of Tile, empty tiles are represented as Tile.NOTILE

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks whether the shelf is full
      Returns:
      True if every box of the shelf is occupied (not Tile.NOTILE)

    • availableColumns

      public List<Integer> availableColumns(int selectionLength)
      Get the list of indices for the columns which can still be filled.
      Parameters:
      selectionLength - Length of the selection, it's supposed to be correct and between 1 and 3
      Returns:
      Index of all columns that have enough space for the selection

    • spaceInColumn

      public int spaceInColumn(int column)
      Get the amount of space left in the given column
      Parameters:
      column - Integer index of column to check
      Returns:
      Number of non-occupied boxes in the column

    • remainingSpace

      public Map<Integer,Integer> remainingSpace()
      Get the amount of space left in each column.
      Returns:
      Map linking each available column to the amount of space it has.

    • addTiles

      public void addTiles(List<Tile> tiles, int col)
      Add ordered list of tiles to given column
      Parameters:
      tiles - Not null, have less or equal than 3 element, be already ordered, NOTILEs will be ignored
      col - Column index, between 0 and 5

    • fromJson

      public static Shelf fromJson(String json)
      Create a Shelf object from a Json string
      Parameters:
      json - a valid json string
      Returns:
      Shelf

      Get the serialized version of this shelf
      Returns:
